name: Puzzle Hotel
description:
Puzzle Hotel is my first fully demoed game; which was made in roughly 3-5 days! I’m really happy with the progress I made on it!

Originally; I wanted to make a cute murder mystery type game, but that kind of devolved into being a simple find the item game; which honestly is probably one of my favorite mobile games to play!

Here is a link to my portfolio page about the game!
https://letotesportfolio.wordpress.com/2020/03/23/puzzle-hotel/
